title: RIOT PlEASE HELP MY Friend
body: his account got hacked and he can't do anything he try to change the password but it did not work he try to get the free jinx skin from a post off of a hacked riot account.his user name is dryads(in game).message me if you can. Thank you for your time

replies.body: Lmao you tried to seek help from OCE Riot boards don't you realize Riot doesn't care about us down here?
